评论详情: This top is so cute!! My advice I would like to share is beware. It you been ordering some garments from Amazon most of us know that some sizes are not true to size from China. But I’m here to say this top is true to size in America size. So unfortunately yet again I may decide to return to go down another size due to being still a tad bit too loose still. Order your true size. Do not go back what is recommended size based off your order history if most of your garments are non US size. You will be in for a rude awakening that it will either be 1 or 2 sizes too big for you.  The material is heavy and of good quality. I like that the zipper blends in and doesn’t show unlike something I ordered similar a few years back with a yellow zipper. My concern would be that the quality of pull on the zipper might break, in which I hope not. But overall the quality of the fabric and style is spectacular.
